entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:03 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -30.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 07:26 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -30.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
